title: Still cheesey as ever
review: I get why these films are so popular and why they have done so well.. But I kind of wish they were a bit more serious and a bit less cheesey. Great action and seeing all these guys on one screen is a spectical

title: Good fun
review: Marvel films tend to be normally filled with cheesey moments this one almost avoids that bar one scene.. It's great fun and the fight scene at the end is good fun to watch and well done

title: One of my favourite marvel movies
review: The iron man series doesn't dissapoint across all three films.. And this one was really good and had a great villain and great subplot. Good fun good action and you believe Robert as the iron man

title: My least favourite of the avengers
review: The film was OK found Chris the guy who plays thor.. To be very clinche and not very good.. But as the film went on the better it got

title: Not the as good as the first
review: What I was expecting to be honest the highlight of the film for me is loki I don't tend to do huge reviews probably for the best as my grammar and opinions are not brilliant... But you Purley have to watch this to complete the mcu universe... It's not terrible just not in the same league as the others
